name: VISAVRSATestsForVancomycinResistanceGene
title: VISA/VRSA (Tests for Vancomycin Resistance Gene)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of vancomycin resistance gene.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: vancomycin resistance; vanA, vanB, vanC, vanD),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
